SEARCH
Package com.ppstudios.footballmanager.api.contracts.team

Interface IClub

All Superinterfaces:
IExporter
public interface IClub extends IExporter
Unified interface representing a football club and its management operations. Combines basic club information, player management, and club validation/strength methods.

      Returns:
      the name of the club.

    • getPlayers

      IPlayer[] getPlayers()
      Returns a (copy) of the players.
      Returns:
      an array (copy) of Player objects.

    • getCode

      String getCode()
      Returns the code of the club. For example: FCP or SLB
      Returns:
      the code of the club.

      Returns the country of the club.

      String getLogo()
      Returns the logo of the club.

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(IPlayer player)
      Adds a player to the club.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the club is full.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is already in the club.

    • isPlayer

      boolean isPlayer(IPlayer player)
      Checks if a player is in the club.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the player is in the club, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is not a valid player.

    • removePlayer

      void removePlayer(IPlayer player)
      Removes a player from the club.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to be removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is not in the club.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is null.

    • getPlayerCount

      int getPlayerCount()
      Returns the number of players in the club.
      Returns:
      the number of players in the club.

    • selectPlayer

      IPlayer selectPlayer(IPlayerSelector selector, IPlayerPosition position)
      Selects a player based on their position or relevance.
      Parameters:
      selector - the selector to use for selecting the player.
      position - the position to filter players by.
      Returns:
      a Player object selected based on the specified position.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if position is null
      IllegalStateException - if no player is found for the specified position
      IllegalStateException - if the club is empty

    • isValid

      boolean isValid()
      Validates the club.
      Returns:
      true if the club is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the club is empty
      IllegalStateException - if the club has no players
      IllegalStateException - if the club has no goalkeeper
      IllegalStateException - if the club has no players in a specific position
      IllegalStateException - if the club dont have at least 16 players
      IllegalStateException - if the club dont have at least 1 goalkeeper
